sentences.en: As Ashley had prophesied hell to pay since the legislature to ratify the amendment.
sentences.cn: 正如艾希礼所说的那样,自从州议会拒绝批准那修正案以来,可真吃不了兜着了.

sentences.en: Before effective change can occur, Liechtenstein must sign and ratify new legal - assistance treaties.
sentences.cn: 要出现实质性变化,列支敦士登必须签署和批准新的法律协助合约.

sentences.en: Check and ratify is collected collect with norm have what distinction, be same?
sentences.cn: 核定征收跟定额征收有什么区别, 是不是一样?

sentences.en: For instance, fictitious money worth is worth formerly how check and ratify?
sentences.cn: 比如, 虚拟货币财产原值如何核定?

sentences.en: Fourth, we will work to ratify and standardize the real estate market.
sentences.cn: 四是大力整顿和规范房地产市场秩序.

sentences.en: Method of De of account limitation check and ratify is differ send.
sentences.cn: 帐户限额核定的方法不一致.

sentences.en: Since the lion has spared you, I will for this time ratify your pardon.
sentences.cn: 既然狮子饶了你, 我这次也赦免你.

sentences.en: The agreement have to be ratify by the board.
sentences.cn: 该协议必须由董事会批准.

sentences.en: The leader of the new republic had no choice but to ratify this treaty.
sentences.cn: 新共和国领导人除批准此约外,别无它法.

sentences.en: The parliaments of Australia and Indonesia have yet to ratify the treaty.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚和印度尼西亚议会还未批准该条约。

sentences.en: The President can make treaties, but the Senate must ratify them.
sentences.cn: 总统可以签订条约, 但须经过参议院的批准.

sentences.en: The third reason, inevitably, is the failure to ratify the constitutional treaty.
sentences.cn: 最后一点原因无疑是各方无法就宪法条例达成一致.

sentences.en: The treaty is ratify by congress.
They ratify the pact because they think it will bring peace.
sentences.cn: 他们批准了这项协定,因为他们认为它将能带来和平.

sentences.en: We will work to ratify and bring into force the test ban treaty.
sentences.cn: 我们将为使《禁止核试验条约》获得批准并生效而努力.

sentences.en: Will you check and ratify the figures?
sentences.cn: 你能把数字核定一下 吗 ?

trans.tran_en: to make a written agreement official by signing it

trans.tran_cn: 正式批准， 使正式生效
trans.tran_en: to make a written agreement official by signing it
